name: Speed Rollers
description:
My very first game.

Speed Runners is a fast paced game, where you dodge obstacles that come flying at you at high speeds.

CONTROLS:

A and D / Left and Right arrow keys to move

Escape / Spacebar to pause

I spent a lot of time and effort on this game and i hope you enjoy it. 

Please consider donating, I would really appreciate it.

Thanks, Brody
